Summary: Blue/white glowing surface bulletshaped object shot across in an instant
divs: sighting detailsit came in fast like a meteorite but no trail behind it. then in under 1\5th of a second it accelerated back into the sky leaving a beam like trail as it went up into the sky in a faster then lighting speed. it happened so fast that if i was to blink i wouldn't of seen it. i was looking towards windsor canada from detroit michigan around 12 at night smoking a cigarette
